item.title: 317 Client loading error
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

The error is self explanatory:

Assuming this is line 53:

It would mean the variable “stream” is null, probably because it can’t find the file “Skins.dat” in your cache.

item.title: 317 Client loading error
item.dc:creator: @Primoscape Primoscape
item.description:
@Primoscape wrote:

Client loads to the 35% then it tells me the client cant load and i have to reload my cache?

http://prntscr.com/6wr9h9

java.lang.NullPointerException at Stream.g2(Stream.java:53) at Class36.loadSkins(Class36.java:12) at Client.startUp(Client.java:12441) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:79) at Client.run(Client.java:8357) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

The lines with the errors ^^ Stream stream = new Stream(FileOperations.ReadFile(signlink.findcachedir() + "Skins.dat")); int numSkins = stream.g2(); skinData = new byte[numSkins][]

Class36.loadSkins();

startUp();

public void run() { if (drawFlames) { drawFlames(); } else { super.run(); } }

Read full topic
